definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: Please see Prayer list on website or Church Bulletin.
sentences.chinese: 每週代禱事項請見網站或公佈欄。

sentences.english: Don’t you ever look at the messages posted on the bulletin board?
sentences.chinese: 你也不看公佈欄上貼的信息嗎？

sentences.english: I saw your advertisement on one of the bulletin boards.
sentences.chinese: 我在某一個公佈欄上看到你的廣告。

sentences.english: Our teacher pinned a notice on the noticeboard.
sentences.chinese: 我們的老師把通知釘在公佈欄上。
